p: The cathodic peak current was lowered, and the peak potential shifted cathodically in the presence of tri-n-butyl phosphate (TBP) and N,N-dihexyloctanamide (DHOA) as ligands, due to the co-ordination of Eu(III) to such species in the ionic liquid medium ( Figure 5). Moreover, the presence of TBP in the ionic liquid medium shifts the Eu(III) to Eu(II) peak potential to more negative values as compared to DHOA (compare Figure 5A,B).
